author: jstrachan
msg: Updated the build to try remove some of the less important check style errors to try highlight the most important errors. Also using Sun rather than Turbine curly bracket notations

author: jstrachan
msg: Updated documentation a touch and started porting the old build system into the new Maven build.

author: jstrachan
msg: Ported the build system to Maven.
Also moved the non-core taglibs into src/taglibs where there will be seperate build files for each optional taglib.

author: jstrachan
msg: Pached a few errors in the SQL taglibs and ensured that any incorrectly typed attribute name results in an error.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched bug in <sql:query> tag which wasn't correctly clearing out previous parameters if the tag gets reused
